notes: October 24 - October 28th, 2016 - from 08:00 a.m. - 06:00 p.m. and on October 29th from 10:00 a.m. - 04:00 p.m., then October 31 - November 4, 2016 from 08:00 a.m. - 06:00 p.m. and then November 5, 2016 from 10:00 a.m. - 04:00 p.m. and then on November 7, 2016 from 08:00 a.m. - 05:00 p.m.

1. Yes, early voting takes place in the Courthouse at the Clerk's Office.2. By law the hours for early voting are 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. M-F, and 10-4 on Saturdays. Early voting (again by law) ends at 5 p.m. on Monday Nov. 7.3. The Baxter County Election Commission plans to hold off-site early voting at the Twin Lakes Plaza. I do not know what hours they plan to be available.

Early voting will take place at the Boone County Election Center located at 414 W. Central Harrison, AR 72601. It is what Arkansas calls an off-site early voting site. Meaning not held at the county clerk's office. EV starts Mon Oct 24-Nov7. Voting hours are M-F 8 am- 6 pm except on November 7th then it is 8 am to 5 pm. On Saturdays, its 10- 4 pm.

At this time, in Grant County we hold early voting in the courthouse only. The starting date is October 24th and will run through November 7th. Week day hours are 8 am until 6pm and we are open both Saturdays from 10 am until 4 pm. If we can help with any other questions, please feel free to contact us.
We are open 8 a.m. - 6 p.m. with the exception of November 7th, on that day we close at 5 p.m.We are also open on Saturdays during those two weeks from 10 a.m.- 4p.m.

No, Early Voting does not take place directly in the county clerk's office. It will take place at First Baptist Church between the hours of 8:00 a.m. and 6:00 p.m., Monday through Friday, and 10:00 a.m. - 4:00 p.m. on Saturday. Early Voting ends at 5:00 p.m. on the Monday prior to the election.
M-F 8-6 pm, Sat 10-4, Nov 7, 8-5; http://dpnfam.net/elecprep/wp-content/downloads/AR/Saline/EV/Early%20Voting-General.pdf for other voting locations

Monday through Friday from 8:00 am to 6:00pm. and Saturday from 10:00am to 4:00pm ending at 5:00 on the Monday before the election. There will be satellite locations, TBD.

Early voting is conducted at the courthouse from 8am-6pm on Monday, October 24-November 4. Monday, November 7 hours are 8am-5pm. Saturday's October 29 & November 5, early voting is open from 10am-4pm. No satellite locations for this county.
